DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation efficacy safety single dose ibuprofen effervescent tablet treatment pain follow third molar extraction comparison single dose placebo , standard ibuprofen tablet , effervescent aspirin plus vitamin C tablet .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Efficacy Ibuprofen Effervescent Tablet Treatment Post-Surgical Dental Pain
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : Moderate severe postoperative pain follow surgical extraction two third molar , least one must partial complete bony mandibular impaction In general good health contraindication study medication rescue medication ( tramadol acetaminophen + hydrocodone ) Use shortacting local anesthetic without vasocontrictor and/or nitrous oxide Exclusion : Presence serious medical condition ( e.g. , poorly control hypertension , diabetes , hyper/hypothyroidism ; significantly impair renal , cardiac , hepatic function ) Acute localize dental alveolar infection time surgery could confound postsurgical evaluation Females pregnant , lactating , childbearing potential , postmenopausal less 2 year use medicallyapproved method contraception
